note.p: Landowner, attorney, and solicitor. Practised in Chelmsford. Retired to Frant, near Tunbridge Wells, by 1871. Donated a herbarium of lichen specimens to the British Museum in 1889.
Census returns of England and Wales 1861 (The National Archives: Public Record Office RG9/1079/33/21), 1871 (RG10/1050/78/7)
England & Wales, national probate calendar (index of wills and administrations), 1858–1966 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 November 2014)
England & Wales, non-conformist and non-parochial registers, 1567–1970 (Ancestry.com, accessed 10 November 2014)
